// define UDF functions
def toYear(s : String): Int = if (s.isEmpty) 0 else (s.slice(0, 0 + 4)).toInt
def toMonth(s : String): Int = if (s.isEmpty) 0 else (s.slice(4, 4 + 2)).toInt
def toDay(s : String): Int = if (s.isEmpty) 0 else (s.slice(6, 6 + 2)).toInt

def getTone(tones: String): Double = tones.split(",")(0).toDouble

// define UDF
val udfToYear = udf(toYear _)
val udfToMonth = udf(toMonth _)
val udfToDay = udf(toDay _)

val udfGetTone = udf(getTone _)

// Load GKG
val rddGkgEng = sc.binaryFiles("s3://aouani-habib-telecom-gdelt2019/20191201[0-9]*.gkg.csv.zip") // charger quelques fichers via une regex
   .flatMap {  // decompresser les fichiers
       case (name: String, content: PortableDataStream) =>
          val zis = new ZipInputStream(content.open)
          Stream.continually(zis.getNextEntry)
                .takeWhile{ case null => zis.close(); false
                            case _ => true }
                .flatMap { _ =>
                    val br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(zis))
                    Stream.continually(br.readLine()).takeWhile(_ != null)
                }
    }

val dfGkgEng = rddGkgEng.map(x => x.split("\t")).toDF()

// Select columns and cast
val dfGkg_3 = dfGkg
    .withColumn("_tmp", $"value")
    .select($"_tmp".getItem(0).as("gkgrecordid"),
            udfToYear($"_tmp".getItem(1)).as("year"),
            udfToMonth($"_tmp".getItem(1)).as("month"),
            udfToDay($"_tmp".getItem(1)).as("day"),
            $"_tmp".getItem(3).as("sourcecommonname"),
            $"_tmp".getItem(8).as("v2themes"),
            $"_tmp".getItem(10).as("v2locations"),
            $"_tmp".getItem(12).as("v2persons"),
            udfGetTone($"_tmp".getItem(15)).as("Tone"))
    .withColumn("v2themes", split($"v2themes", ";"))
    .withColumn("v2locations", split($"v2locations", ";"))
    .withColumn("v2persons", split($"v2persons", ";"))
    .filter(!($"SourceCommonName" === ""))

dfGkg_3.printSchema()

// Locations
val df3GkgLocations = dfGkg_3
    .withColumn("location", explode_outer($"v2locations"))
    .withColumn("location", split($"location", "#")(2))
    .select("gkgrecordid",
            "sourcecommonname",
            "year", "month", "day",
            "tone", "location")
    .filter(!($"Location" === ""))
    .dropDuplicates("gkgrecordid", "location")

// Aggregation
val df3GkgLocationsAgg = df3GkgLocations
    .groupBy("sourcecommonname", "year", "month", "day", "location")
    .agg(count($"gkgrecordid").as("numarticles"),
         avg($"tone").as("avgtone"))
